title: Braced for 'day of anger'
description: Palestinian leaders in the West Bank have called for a "day of anger" on Friday to protest against the Israeli offensive in Gaza.
content:
Israel: 'It's not clear it's our fire'

At least 13 people were killed and more than 200 injured when a school in Gaza run by the United Nations came under fire. Israeli government spokesman Mark Regev says it is not clear yet if it was errant fire from Israel.
